description: Creates an API destination, which is an HTTP invocation endpoint configured as a target for events. API destinations do not support private destinations, such as interface VPC endpoints. For more information, see API destinations in the EventBridge User Guide.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name for the API destination to create.

parameters.name: ConnectionArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the connection to use for the API destination. The destination endpoint must support the authorization type specified for the connection.

parameters.name: InvocationEndpoint
parameters.description: The URL to the HTTP invocation endpoint for the API destination.

parameters.name: HttpMethod
parameters.description: The method to use for the request to the HTTP invocation endpoint.

nested_items.name: ApiDestinationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the API destination that was created by the request.

nested_items.name: ApiDestinationState
nested_items.description: The state of the API destination that was created by the request.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp indicating the time that the API destination was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp indicating the time that the API destination was last modified.
